title: Systematic Instructional Design Strategies for Early Childhood Computational Thinking Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Curriculum Design Knowledge and Understanding of Digital Education Trends
context.additional_context: Enhancing instructional design competencies for corporate training managers/leaders to develop early childhood computational thinking education programs

learning_goals: Analysis of research trends in early childhood computational thinking education using systematic literature review methodology.
Designing age-appropriate computational thinking educational activities and developing proficiency in utilizing VR simulation tools.
Development of a project-based assessment system for evaluating collaborative problem-solving skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
